data.text: “Bende ingʼeyo kinde ma diek manie got nywolie?
Bende inyalo ngʼeyo dweche ma igi pongʼie?
Gigoyo chonggi piny ka ginywol,
Nyithindgi dongo motegno kendo mopugno ka gin e thim;
“En ngʼa mane ogonyo kanyna e bungu?
Ne amiye thim motwo kaka dalane,
Gidak mabor gi mier, omiyo ok giwinj koko ma ji goyo;
Okwayo ewi gode eka oyud lum mochamo
“Bende jowi ma e thim yie tiyoni?
Bende inyalo boye moluni opara tir?
Bende diket genoni kuom tekone mangʼenygo?
Bende in-gi adiera ni onyalo tingʼoni cham
“Udo kwadho bwombene gi mor,
Onywolo tonge piny e lowo
kendo ok odew ni gimoro
Ojwangʼo nyithinde ma pod yom, ka gima ok gin mage owuon;
nikech Nyasaye ne ok omiye rieko
Kata kamano ka oyaro bwombene mondo oringi,
“In ema imiyo faras teko ma en-go
In ema imiyo ochikore ka bonyo,
Ogwetho piny gi mirima gi tekre duto,
Ok oluor kendo onge gima goye kibaji,
Pien motingʼie asere tuomore e bathe kama oliere,
Ogwetho koikore ne lweny;
Ochur seche duto mowinjo ka turumbete ywak!
“Riekoni bende nyalo miyo ongo ringi
Bende inyalo chiko ongo mi fu kochomo polo,
Odak ewi lwendni maboyo kendo odak kuno nyaka otieno;
Kanyo ema omanye chiembe
Nyithinde matindo to remo e chiembgi,
